tool.name: msPurity.createMSP
tool.description: Create MSP files from msPurity processed data

param.name: rdata_input
param.label: msPurity purityA dataset
param.help: RData file containing the purityA object following frag4feature and/or averageFragmentation

param.name: method
param.label: How to choose fragmentation spectra (if precursor was fragmented in >1 scans per XCMS group feature)
param.help: 'Average all' will use the averaged MS/MS spectra of the XCMS grouped feature, ignoring inter and intra file relationships, 'Average' (intra)' will use the intra file (within file) averaged MS/MS spectra of the XCMS grouped feature, 'Average (inter)' will use the inter file (across file) MS/MS averaged spectra, 'All scans' will export all matching MS/MS spectra to XCMS grouped features, 'Max intensity' will choose the most MS/MS spectra with the most intense precursor ion for each XCMS grouped feature

param.name: metadata
param.label: Metadata for each feature
param.help: Metadata for each grouped XCMS feature, the data will be added to the MSP metadata. Using the MassBank format e.g. https://github.com/MassBank/MassBank-data/blob/master/MetaboLights/ML003001.txt

param.name: metadata_cols
param.label: Metadata columns for name
param.help: Comma separated string of column names where the corresponding values in the metadata will be used for the MSP spectra name

param.name: adduct_split
param.label: Create MSP spectra for each adduct?
param.help: If either 'adduct' or 'MS$FOCUSED_ION: PRECURSOR_TYPE' column is in metadata then each adduct will have it's own MSP spectra. (Useful, if the MSP file will be used for further annotation)

param.name: xcms_group_select
param.label: Select XCMS groups?
param.help: if set to no, all XCMS group features will be used

param.name: xcms_groupids
param.label: XCMS peak group ids
param.help: Comma separated string of XCMS group ids to export MSP spectra for. If blank all XCMS peak groups will be used

param.name: intensity_ra
param.label: Include intensity, relative abundanace or both in the MSP file

param.name: msp_schema
param.label: MSP schema to use for files

param.name: filter
param.label: Filter peaks that have been flagged in prior processing steps

param.name: metadata_cond|metadata_cols
param.value: AC$CHROMATOGRAPHY: COLUMN_NAME, AC$MASS_SPECTROMETRY: ION_MODE, AC$MASS_SPECTROMETRY: MS_TYPE, CH$LINK: INCHIKEY, CH$LINK: PUBCHEM CH$NAME

tool.help:
------------------------------ Create MSP Files from msPurity ------------------------------
Description -----------
| This tool will extract the MSMS spectra data from an msPurity-frag4feature object into a file with MSP data format.
